Welcome to Python-Unity Images documentation!¶

Python Code¶

client.py¶

class client.client_communicator_to_unity(use_unity_build=True, log_level=20)¶
__init__(use_unity_build=True, log_level=20)¶

Creates a socket and a logger for the console and saves a log file at: log/python_client.log. Starts Unity if use_unity_build == True and waits until Unity is fully started to then call the function connect_to_server().

Parameters

  • use_unity_build (bool, optional) --

    defaults to True,

    If this is set true the Unity build will start. Otherwise you should already set the Unity editor to play.,

  • log_level (int, optional) --

    defaults to logging.INFO,

    This variable sets the logging level of the console handler for the class which means how much information is displayed to your console. For debugging set it to: logging.DEBUG

Raises

IOError -- Raises IOError if Unity build can not be found.

connect_to_server()¶

Establish tcp socket connection to Unity server.

Load client tcp config from data/python/client_tcp_config.json.

Try to connect to the Unity server.

If connection is established save the tcp config to data/python/client_tcp_config.json.

exit()¶

Close tcp connection and send end request to Unity which quits the build application.

receive_data_as_bytes()¶

Receive image data from Unity trough socket. Ends by timeout, returns bytearray

Returns

From Unity recived bytearray.

Return type

bytearray

recive_image(json_string)¶

Send string to Unity server and recive corresponding image.

Parameters

json_string (string) -- This string has to be comprehensible for Unity which are strings returned by write_json_crane()

Returns

Image corresponding to the input string.

Return type

PngImageFile-array

send_to_unity(json_string, exit=False)¶

Send data to Unity server.

Parameters

  • json_string (string) -- This string will be sent to Unity. Has to be readable by Unity.

  • exit (bool, optional) --

    defaults to False,

    If this is True the Unity build will close.

write_json_crane(total_cuboids=3, same_scale=True, scale=2.0, same_theta=True, theta=40.0, phi=0.0, total_branches=None, same_material=True, metallic=0.5, smoothness=0.5, r=1.0, g=1.0, b=1.0, a=1.0, CameraRes_width=256, CameraRes_height=256, Camera_FieldofView=60.0, CameraRadius=None, CameraTheta=90.0, CameraPhi=0.0, CameraVerticalOffset=0.0, totalPointLights=1, same_PointLightsColor=True, PointLightsColor_r=1.0, PointLightsColor_g=1.0, PointLightsColor_b=1.0, PointLightsColor_a=1.0, PointLightsRadius=[7.0], PointLightsTheta=[20.0], PointLightsPhi=[0.0], PointLightsIntensity=[1.0], PointLightsRange=[10.0], totalSpotLights=1, same_SpotLightsColor=True, SpotLightsColor_r=1.0, SpotLightsColor_g=1.0, SpotLightsColor_b=1.0, SpotLightsColor_a=1.0, SpotLightsRadius=[10.0], SpotLightsTheta=[0.0], SpotLightsPhi=[0.0], SpotLightsIntensity=[1.0], SpotLightsRange=[10.0], SpotAngle=[30.0], DirectionalLightTheta=30.0, DirectionalLightIntensity=0.8)¶

Returns string according to input parameter which can be interpreted by the Unity server.

Parameters

  • total_cuboids (int, optional) -- [description], defaults to 3

  • same_scale (bool, optional) -- [description], defaults to True

  • scale (int, optional) -- [description], defaults to 2

  • same_theta (bool, optional) -- [description], defaults to True

  • theta (int, optional) -- [description], defaults to 40

  • phi (int, optional) -- [description], defaults to 0

  • total_branches ([type], optional) -- [description], defaults to None

  • same_material (bool, optional) -- [description], defaults to True

  • metallic (float, optional) -- [description], defaults to 0.5

  • smoothness (float, optional) -- [description], defaults to 0.5

  • r (int, optional) -- [description], defaults to 1

  • g (int, optional) -- [description], defaults to 1

  • b (int, optional) -- [description], defaults to 1

  • a (int, optional) -- [description], defaults to 1

  • CameraRes_width (int, optional) -- [description], defaults to 256

  • CameraRes_height (int, optional) -- [description], defaults to 256

  • Camera_FieldofView (int, optional) -- [description], defaults to 60

  • CameraRadius (float, optional) -- [description], defaults to None

  • CameraTheta (int, optional) -- [description], defaults to 90

  • CameraPhi (int, optional) -- [description], defaults to 0

  • CameraVerticalOffset (int, optional) -- [description], defaults to 0

  • totalPointLights (int, optional) -- [description], defaults to 1

  • same_PointLightsColor (bool, optional) -- [description], defaults to True

  • PointLightsColor_r (int, optional) -- [description], defaults to 1

  • PointLightsColor_g (int, optional) -- [description], defaults to 1

  • PointLightsColor_b (int, optional) -- [description], defaults to 1

  • PointLightsColor_a (int, optional) -- [description], defaults to 1

  • PointLightsRadius (list, optional) -- [description], defaults to [7]

  • PointLightsTheta (list, optional) -- [description], defaults to [20]

  • PointLightsPhi (list, optional) -- [description], defaults to [0]

  • PointLightsIntensity (list, optional) -- [description], defaults to [1]

  • PointLightsRange (list, optional) -- [description], defaults to [10]

  • totalSpotLights (int, optional) -- [description], defaults to 1

  • same_SpotLightsColor (bool, optional) -- [description], defaults to True

  • SpotLightsColor_r (int, optional) -- [description], defaults to 1

  • SpotLightsColor_g (int, optional) -- [description], defaults to 1

  • SpotLightsColor_b (int, optional) -- [description], defaults to 1

  • SpotLightsColor_a (int, optional) -- [description], defaults to 1

  • SpotLightsRadius (list, optional) -- [description], defaults to [10]

  • SpotLightsTheta (list, optional) -- [description], defaults to [0]

  • SpotLightsPhi (list, optional) -- [description], defaults to [0]

  • SpotLightsIntensity (list, optional) -- [description], defaults to [1]

  • SpotLightsRange (list, optional) -- [description], defaults to [10]

  • SpotAngle (list, optional) -- [description], defaults to [30]

  • DirectionalLightTheta (int, optional) -- [description], defaults to 30

  • DirectionalLightIntensity (float, optional) -- [description], defaults to 0.8

Returns

Corresponding string fromatted for Unity. Can be used in recive_image().

Return type

string

config ([type]) -- [description]

writeConfig(same_scale=None, scale=[0.5, 4], total_cuboids=[2, 12], phi=[0, 360], enable_many_arms=[1, 3], same_theta=None, theta=None, same_material=None, r=[0, 1], g=[0, 1], b=[0, 1], a=[0.5, 1], metallic=[0, 1], smoothness=[0, 1], CameraRadius=10.0, CameraTheta=[30, 100], CameraPhi=[0, 360], CameraVerticalOffset=None, totalPointLights=[5, 12], PointLightsRadius=[5, 20], PointLightsPhi=[0, 360], PointLightsTheta=[0, 90], PointLightsIntensity=[7, 17], PointLightsRange=[5, 25], samePointLightColor=None, PointLightsColor_r=[0, 1], PointLightsColor_g=[0, 1], PointLightsColor_b=[0, 1], PointLightsColor_a=[0.5, 1], totalSpotLights=None, SpotLightsRadius=[5, 20], SpotLightsPhi=[0, 360], SpotLightsTheta=[0, 90], SpotLightsIntensity=[5, 15], SpotLightsRange=[5, 25], SpotLightsAngle=[5, 120], sameSpotLightColor=None, SpotLightsColor_r=[0, 1], SpotLightsColor_g=[0, 1], SpotLightsColor_b=[0, 1], SpotLightsColor_a=[0.5, 1], DirectionalLightTheta=[0, 90], DirectionalLightIntensity=[0.1, 1.8])¶

Retruns a config as dictionary which determines the interval for all random parameters created in the function create_random_parameters.

Parameters

  • same_scale ([type], optional) -- [description], defaults to None

  • scale (list, optional) -- [description], defaults to [0.5,4]

  • total_cuboids (list, optional) -- [description], defaults to [2,12]

  • phi (list, optional) -- [description], defaults to [0,360]

  • enable_many_arms (list, optional) -- [description], defaults to [1,3]

  • same_theta ([type], optional) -- [description], defaults to None

  • theta ([type], optional) -- [description], defaults to None

  • same_material ([type], optional) -- [description], defaults to None

  • r (list, optional) -- [description], defaults to [0,1]

  • g (list, optional) -- [description], defaults to [0,1]

  • b (list, optional) -- [description], defaults to [0,1]

  • a (list, optional) -- [description], defaults to [0.5,1]

  • metallic (list, optional) -- [description], defaults to [0,1]

  • smoothness (list, optional) -- [description], defaults to [0,1]

  • CameraRadius (float, optional) -- [description], defaults to 10.0

  • CameraTheta (list, optional) -- [description], defaults to [30,100]

  • CameraPhi (list, optional) -- [description], defaults to [0,360]

  • CameraVerticalOffset ([type], optional) -- [description], defaults to None

  • totalPointLights (list, optional) -- [description], defaults to [5,12]

  • PointLightsRadius (list, optional) -- [description], defaults to [5,20]

  • PointLightsPhi (list, optional) -- [description], defaults to [0,360]

  • PointLightsTheta (list, optional) -- [description], defaults to [0,90]

  • PointLightsIntensity (list, optional) -- [description], defaults to [7,17]

  • PointLightsRange (list, optional) -- [description], defaults to [5,25]

  • samePointLightColor ([type], optional) -- [description], defaults to None

  • PointLightsColor_r (list, optional) -- [description], defaults to [0,1]

  • PointLightsColor_g (list, optional) -- [description], defaults to [0,1]

  • PointLightsColor_b (list, optional) -- [description], defaults to [0,1]

  • PointLightsColor_a (list, optional) -- [description], defaults to [0.5,1]

  • totalSpotLights ([type], optional) -- [description], defaults to None

  • SpotLightsRadius (list, optional) -- [description], defaults to [5,20]

  • SpotLightsPhi (list, optional) -- [description], defaults to [0,360]

  • SpotLightsTheta (list, optional) -- [description], defaults to [0,90]

  • SpotLightsIntensity (list, optional) -- [description], defaults to [5,15]

  • SpotLightsRange (list, optional) -- [description], defaults to [5,25]

  • SpotLightsAngle (list, optional) -- [description], defaults to [5,120]

  • sameSpotLightColor ([type], optional) -- [description], defaults to None

  • SpotLightsColor_r (list, optional) -- [description], defaults to [0,1]

  • SpotLightsColor_g (list, optional) -- [description], defaults to [0,1]

  • SpotLightsColor_b (list, optional) -- [description], defaults to [0,1]

  • SpotLightsColor_a (list, optional) -- [description], defaults to [0.5,1]

  • DirectionalLightTheta (list, optional) -- [description], defaults to [0,90]

  • DirectionalLightIntensity (list, optional) -- [description], defaults to [0.1,1.8]
